title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI tool to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with a single command; includes a built-in model registry and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for easy model chat, generate, embed, pull, and create operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers, exposing the same chat, generate, and embedding endpoints.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package adding Ollama LLM, chat, and embedding components to the LangChain ecosystem.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama-cli (mattw/ollama-cli)
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) for interactive Ollama chats written in Go; supports history, themes, and keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot (sammcj/ollama-copilot)
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-rag (ggerganov/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and Android compatibility.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/ollama-haystack)
summary: Haystack integration by deepset-ai allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-curl (fjam/ollama-curl)
summary: Collection of POSIX shell functions wrapping curl to pull, run, and chat with Ollama models from scripts.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal pod autoscaler.

title: ollama-discord-bot (tek/ollama-discord-bot)
summary: Lightweight Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into channels using slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger (dagger/daggerverse/tree/main/ollama)
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Curated list of community packages on npm tagged with 'ollama' including wrappers, CLI tools, and UI components.

title: Awesome-Ollama (awesome-ollama/awesome-ollama)
summary: Community-maintained Awesome list aggregating libraries, UIs, integrations, tutorials, and model mods for Ollama.
